pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dyadic Structural Equation Modeling // Scripting of structural equation models via 'lavaan' for Dyadic Data Analysis, and helper functions for supplemental calculations, tabling, and model visualization. Current models supported include Dyadic Confirmatory Factor Analysis, the ActorPartner Interdependence Model (observed and latent), the Common Fate Model (observed and latent), Mutual Influence Model (latent), and the Bifactor Dyadic Model (latent).
